mapper.insert: insert into sws_request_log (app_id, secret, salt, token, create_time, update_time, is_del) values (#{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{secret,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{token,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOW() , NOW(), 1 )
mapper.select: select id, app_id, update_time, token from sws_request_log where is_del = 1
mapper.update: update sws_request_log set is_del = 0 where id = #{id} and is_del = 1
